climbs.name: Styrofoam Boots
climbs.fa: ? maybe Max Joseph and Neil Kauffman

content.description: This climb ascends a series of hand and fist cracks, with a few sections of face climbing, and a steep jug pulling finale.
content.protection: Gear to 4", doubles in hand sizes
content.location: This route is located on the far left side (North face) of the Psycho Killer formation.

content.description:
This route starts to the right of some roofs at the left center of the crag.

Climb a ramp to a bolt, traverse left to a dihedral. After the dihedral, climb left past a roof then follow slab.
This route is given 5.8 in the guide but definitely at least R on bad rock.  Not much fun here.
content.protection: There are two old bolts otherwise cams up to BD #2 including small TCUs.  There is a short rap station on the E side of the pillar which could be used for the belay.
content.location: This route is just to the right of Psycho Killer.  Descent is down the E side by a short rap and scramble.

content.description: Hand crack with patina plates.  Pass a small bulge(crux) with a hand/fist crack and great face holds. Continue up face holds/friction over bulges with thin horizontals for pro or fist+ crack to left, careful of rope drag. Scramble across ledge to face climb to the top. Gear anchor. Rap off back 15m
content.protection: Gear to 4.   Gear anchor. Fixed rap 15m off back.  One 60m rope.
content.location: Psycho Killer Rock  far right side.  Last tower. Start by tree and chest high boulder in a hand crack with patina holds.  Rap off back then walk around to start.
